synopsis.native: Incarcéré dans une prison du Nevada, Roman n’a plus de contact avec l’extérieur ni avec sa fille. Pour tenter de le sortir de son mutisme et de sa violence, on lui propose d’intégrer un programme de réhabilitation sociale grâce au dressage de chevaux sauvages. Aux côtés de ces mustangs aussi imprévisibles que lui, Roman va peu à peu réapprendre à se contrôler et surmonter son passé.
synopsis.english: Locked up in a Nevada prison, Roman no longer has any contact with the outside world nor with his daughter. He's withdrawn into himself, with his anger and violence as his only company. To try to exit from his isolation, he joins a prisoners' rehabilitation program that involves taming wild horses. Alongside these mustangs as unpredictable as he is, Roman will gradually learn to control himself and to get over his past.
